Xbox 360 media plays does play AVI, MPEG, WMV, VOB, MOV.  But it doesn't play MKV or MP4 (you can trick it into playing some Mp4's by changing the filename extension to ".avi")  I wish MS would upgrade the codec support for it's media player, but I have a better chance of advocating for .avi movies here on PB then I would advocating for a media player update on MS.  Plus other than file size, there nothing wrong with avi.

The Xbox360 plays MP4 files, but it has to be the right CODEC!  I have plenty MP4s that play on my Xbox360, without transcoding.  PS3 has a wider variety of codecs...  For Xbox360, they are mostly .AVI, but even they must be a codec it plays.  FOr example? Speed Racer H264.mp4 plays just fine, and any other MP4 that has the same codec, plays JUST FINE.
